intro: Triumfetta viridis, commonly known as green triumfetta, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Malvaceae. It is native to tropical and subtropical regions of Africa, Asia, and the Pacific. The plant features small, greenish-yellow flowers that are clustered in dense inflorescences. Its leaves are simple, ovate, and often have a velvety texture. Triumfetta viridis is typically found in open woodlands, grasslands, and along roadsides, thriving in well-drained soils.
